Dear Cynthia 

 

Hope you’re doing well. 

 

Following internal feedback from the finance teams, as per audit requirement and accounting standard (IFRS), if there is any change in lease period date compared to existing lease, we need an amended lease agreement with start and end date of lease period with revised payment schedule which will be used to derecognize the existing lease assets and liability from our books of accounts with the modified one.

 

With this in mind, we require a variation agreement for each brand specifying the store opening date, rent commencement date and lease term, as follows:

 

SEPHORA

*	Store Opening Date: 4 May 2023
*	Rent Commencement Date: 27 February 2024
*	Lease Term: sixty (60) months from and including the Store Opening Date (4 May 2023 to 3 May 2028).

 

L’OCCITANE

*	Store Opening Date: 1 May 2023
*	Rent Commencement Date: 27 February 2024
*	Lease Term: thirty-six (36) months from and including the Store Opening Date (1 May 2023 to 1 May 2026).
